title: privacy riot games to check account info? Is this legit from riot?
body:
https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/

I went on this because my friend tells me I can check my account info on this, I logged on. But now I'm scared this wasn't an actual riot website. Please tell me.

replies.body:
> Yes, that is a Riot website (indicated by riotgames.com).

This is correct. Any other sites that would claim to give this info I would stay away from, but in this case, you're safe!
